item.title: Site redesign
item.description: I’m switching away from the templates github pages has in store and do my own thing. Well not quite yet. As Angular was too much effort to maintain, I decided to switch to Hugo. It’s a fast, reliable static site generator that fits all my needs. As you can see now, it’s basically operating. Hopefully there will be some customisation in the upcoming weeks. Stay tuned.
